comments.text:
There a couple of test addons at https://apps.mozillalabs.com/appdir/ by Mozilla Labs, Rainbooth and Manifest Checker.

Neither of them can be installed from addons.mozilla.org because they have the installs_allowed_from set to:

"http://people.mozilla.org", "http://apps.mozillalabs.com", "https://apps.mozillalabs.com"

It would be nice if we could use and test these add-ons out on AMO. The domains that they could be installed from would be:

https://addons-dev.allizom.org, https://addons.mozilla.org and wherever else domains the app store ends up on.

Currently the install for these just fails with no error or warning.
